item.title: About
item.description: I enjoy robotics ! I am researching on humanoid robot at JSK Robotics Laboratry. Education Currentry researching as master student in Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, University of Tokyo(04/2020-) B.S.M.E, University of Tokyo(04/2016 ~) Department of Mechano Infomatics, Faculty of Engineering (04/2018 ~ 03/2020) Faculty of Liberal Arts(04/2016 ~ 03/2018) Azabu High School (~ 03/2016) International Exchage Program, Y.F.S, Ohio, US (09/2013 ~ 06/2014) Publications Y.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to concat to me !

item.title: Projects
item.description: Learning of Tool Force Adjustment Skills by a Life-sized Humanoid using Deep Reinforcement Learning and Active Teaching Request We demonstrated the effectiveness of our proposed system through a hacksaw skill acquisition and a Japanese planer (Kanna) skill acquisition by a life-sized humanoid robot.
